name: Fruit Frenzy (cdm12y)
description:
Fruit Frenzy:

Fruits of different types and colors fall from the top of the screen randomly; the player's goal is to catch as many fruits as possible without letting them fall to the ground.

This is a very early build, expect more mechanics and features.

What to expect:

Power Ups:  Occasionally, power-ups will fall from the top of the screen, such as a shield to protect the player from losing a life, a magnet to attract fruits to the player, or a slowdown effect to make the game easier for a short period of time.

Lives and game over:  The player has three lives at the start of the game, and loses a life every time a fruit falls to the ground without being caught,  If the player loses all three lives, the game is over and the player's score is displayed.

Score system:  Each fruit caught earns points, and different types of fruits have different point values.

Donate so I will be able to build upon this small project and maybe be able to finish it.
